column2: A new Empire is founded!
A new Kingdom is founded!
Is [Root.GetKingQueen] of Italy or [Root.GetEmperorEmpress] of Italia\n
Holds at least one kingdom or empire title within the de jure empires of Francia, Germania, Hispania or Britannia\n
No other Christian ruler is Emperor of Italia, Francia, Germania, Hispania or Britannia\n
Is the target of a known or suspected murder plot\n
Ogier the Dane arrives at your court.
Did not recently come out of hiding\n
Muslim rulers will condemn you for your Idolatry.\n
Orthodox Christians in the Empire will rejoice.\n
Roland arrives at your court.
The Viking Age begins - Norse counties receive shipyards and increased shipbuilding technology.\n
Hold 3 kingdom titles\n
Hold 3 duchy titles\n
Characters of Germanic religion now get new Casus Bellis.
